svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 21 2023
October 21 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 21, 2023" date: "2023-10-21"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Devnet 9: testing found issue with conflicting blobs, to
be clarified in the spec Devnet 10: launch expected next week, waiting on KZG in clients (Go-KZG dependencies)
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet 9: testing found issue with conflicting blobs, to be clarified in the spec
Devnet 9: testing found issue with conflicting blobs, to be clarified in the spec
â€¢ Devnet 10: launch expected next week, waiting on KZG in clients (Go-KZG dependencies)
Devnet 10: launch expected next week, waiting on KZG in clients (Go-KZG dependencies)
â€¢ Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.3 : mainnet KZG config and adds blob gossip condition
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.3 : mainnet KZG config and adds blob gossip condition
â€¢ Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
â€¢ Blob testing: Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs Nethermind send blobs : tool to send valid/invalid
blobs
Blob testing:
â€¢ Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs
Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs
â€¢ Nethermind send blobs : tool to send valid/invalid blobs
Nethermind send blobs : tool to send valid/invalid blobs
â€¢ KZG Ceremony: verify transcript & buy a POAP (~$0.25 for contributions that used Sign-in with Ethereum, currently no POAP for GitHub
contributors)
KZG Ceremony: verify transcript & buy a POAP (~$0.25 for contributions that used Sign-in with Ethereum, currently no POAP for GitHub
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.74% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.74% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
For Stakers
â€¢ Validator entry & exit queues reached zero
Validator entry & exit queues reached zero
â€¢ Lighthouse trialing QUIC support for improved throughput & latency
Lighthouse trialing QUIC support for improved throughput & latency
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk usage & state management, not recommended for
mainnet, supports Deneb on devnets Nimbus v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g. HoleÅ¡ky testnet)
Prysm v4.1.0 : Deneb foundations, reduced memory via multi-value slices, EIP4881 (deposit tree) for improved block processing, BLST
v0.3.11 for improved portable build performance and multiarch containers preview
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk usage & state management, not recommended for mainnet, supports Deneb
on devnets
Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk usage & state management, not recommended for mainnet, supports Deneb
â€¢ Nimbus v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g. HoleÅ¡ky testnet)
Nimbus v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g. HoleÅ¡ky testnet)
â€¢ Prysm v4.1.0 : Deneb foundations, reduced memory via multi-value slices, EIP4881 (deposit tree) for improved block processing, BLST
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth v1.13.4 : hotfix lowers warning log triggered by Erigon
Execution layer:
â€¢ Geth v1.13.4 : hotfix lowers warning log triggered by Erigon
Research
â€¢ Terence: forward inclusion-list with dedicated gas limits
Terence: forward inclusion-list with dedicated gas limits

EIPs/Standards

Asynchronous ERC4626 tokenized vaults

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Reminder: Goerli testnet is deprecated, Base & Arbitrum are migrating testnets to Sepolia
Reminder: Goerli testnet is deprecated, Base & Arbitrum are migrating testnets to Sepolia
â€¢ Remix Cookbook plugin updated, one click code import
Remix Cookbook plugin updated, one click code import
â€¢ P256Verifier Vyper : contract for P256 signature verification rewritten in Vyper
P256Verifier Vyper : contract for P256 signature verification rewritten in Vyper
â€¢ Slither v0.10.0 : adds Vyper support, new detectors (incorrect-return, return-leave, incorrect-exp, tautological-compare & return-bomb),
new printers (ck, halstead & martin) and improved Foundry support
Slither v0.10.0 : adds Vyper support, new detectors (incorrect-return, return-leave, incorrect-exp, tautological-compare & return-bomb),
â€¢ Guide to multicall in dapps using wagmi
Guide to multicall in dapps using wagmi
â€¢ noble-ciphers v0.4 : AES in pure JavaScript, useful for platforms such as React Native
noble-ciphers v0.4 : AES in pure JavaScript, useful for platforms such as React Native
â€¢ Personae Sapir : client-side zk proving library, experimental, based on Spartan
Personae Sapir : client-side zk proving library, experimental, based on Spartan
Security
â€¢ HopeLend protocol 528 ETH exploit via precision loss, attack was frontrun with assets later returned
Ecosystem
â€¢ Hackathons: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur finalists Huffathon winners

Ethereum Kuala Lumpur finalists

Enterprise
â€¢ Reddit community points being sunset, due to scalability & regulatory environment
Reddit community points being sunset, due to scalability & regulatory environment

Ferrari accepting ETH & USDC payments for cars in US
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.0 to 123.6 gwei, with 9.1 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 21.5 gwei 9.4k ETH net
issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.0 to 123.6 gwei, with 9.1 gwei average

Zero net issuance currently at 21.5 gwei

9.4k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,546 - $1,627, currently $1,605
ETHUSD : $1,546 - $1,627, currently $1,605
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ PoolTogether v5 live on Optimism, permissionless, enter via deposit in app or swap, prizes automatically sent
PoolTogether v5 live on Optimism, permissionless, enter via deposit in app or swap, prizes automatically sent
â€¢ Kain: Synthetix experiments , deploy to Base, Optimism & Arbitrum with non-SNX collateral, deploy an optimized version of perps to
mainnet and create a SNX chain using OP Stack
Kain: Synthetix experiments , deploy to Base, Optimism & Arbitrum with non-SNX collateral, deploy an optimized version of perps to mainnet
and create a SNX chain using OP Stack

Yearn veYFI : ve-style tokenomics

Rysk finance atomic credit spreads ; [ Starbloom portfolio]
â€¢ Uniswap Labs adds 0.15% fee for major token swaps via their UI, no fee for using protocol
Uniswap Labs adds 0.15% fee for major token swaps via their UI, no fee for using protocol

overestimated
